summary: Welcome to SOLDIER. This armor set adds all three of the SOLDIER class armor to Skyrim, along with the SOLDIER sword, and an added bonus of Cloud Strife\'s original armor.
descriptionHtml:
=====Author\'s Note=====

Welcome to SOLDIER. This armor set adds all three of the SOLDIER class armor to Skyrim, along with the SOLDIER sword, and an added bonus of Cloud Strife\'s original armor. 
Each of these amazing armors come to you thanks to an amazing team of platyhelminthes, maymay1588, K1lla, And Cloudstife

=====About the Mod=====

REQUIRES VERSION 1.8 OF SKYRIM, UPDATE YOUR GAME TO USE

Added five stand-alone, craft/enchant/temper armor and greatsword to the game. Armors will be harder to forge depending on class. 

Soldier 3rd Class
value: 1997
Weight: 6
Light Armor
Armor Rating: 28
Steel Plate 

Soldier 2nd Class
value: 1997
Weight: 8
Light Armor
Armor Rating: 40
Steel Plate 

Soldier 1st class
value: 1997
Weight: 10
Light Armor
Armor Rating: 51
Steel Plate 

Cloud Soldier Armor 
value: 1997
Weight: 9.5
Light Armor
Armor Rating: 53
Steel Plate 

Cloud Greatsword
Two-Handed
Value: 1997
Weight: 17
Damage: 21
Crit Damage: 12
Silver

=====Instructions=====

Install
1.	Download and extract file into the Data folder, by default its location should be steam/steamapp/common/Skyrim/data
2.	Use console command \'soldier\' or forge to retrieve armor and sword.

Uninstall
1.	Remove the mesh and texture folders for armor as well as the .esp file

=====Credits=====

Bethesda for the creation of Skyrim, the meshes and textures used for edit, and the creation kit.

Gimp/Photoshop

Nifscope

3DSMax

K1lla and Cloudstife for the creation of the meshes

Platyhelminthes for the textures and the work in the Creation Kit

Maymay1588 for rigging the skeleton and weight slider compatibility
author: cloudstife maymay1588 platyhelminthes
